    • getProtocolVersion

      public String getProtocolVersion()
      Description copied from interface: SimpleChannel
      Gets the channel's protocol version. This is already used internally when packets are sent back and forth to check for mismatches.
      Specified by:
      getProtocolVersion in interface SimpleChannel

    • sendToServer

      public <T> void sendToServer(String id, T packet)
      Description copied from interface: SimpleChannel
      Sends a packet to the server. If the packet has not yet been registered within this channel, or if it is registered for the wrong logical side, throws an exception.
      Specified by:
      sendToServer in interface SimpleChannel
      Parameters:
      id - the packet's id
      packet - the packet to send

    • sendToClients

      public <T> void sendToClients(String id, T packet, net.minecraft.server.level.ServerPlayer... players)
      Description copied from interface: SimpleChannel
      Sends a packet to the specified clients. If the packet has not yet been registered within this channel, or if it is registered for the wrong logical side, throws an exception.
      Specified by:
      sendToClients in interface SimpleChannel
      Parameters:
      id - the packet's id
      packet - the packet to send
      players - the clients to send the packet to

    • registerPacket

      public <T> PacketHandler<T> registerPacket(String id, Class<T> packetClass, BiConsumer<T,ExtraFriendlyByteBuf> serializer, Function<ExtraFriendlyByteBuf,T> deserializer)
      Description copied from interface: SimpleChannel
      Creates and registers a packet handler, returning the handler object for you to register server- and client-side packet receive callbacks.
      Specified by:
      registerPacket in interface SimpleChannel
      Parameters:
      id - the packet's id, unique to this channel
      packetClass - the packet's class
      serializer - a function that serializes the packet to a FriendlyByteBuf
      deserializer - a function that deserializes the packet from a FriendlyByteBuf
